alert.note: Alert for Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 11 at 2:29AM MDT until April 12 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Tusas Mountains Including Chama. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
